org.apache.juneau.rest.rrpc

Class RrpcRestOpContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.rest.RestOpContext
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.rrpc.RrpcRestOpContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<RestOpContext>, AnnotationProvider

    public class RrpcRestOpContext
extends RestOpContext
    A specialized RestOpContext for handling "RRPC" HTTP methods.
    • This class is thread safe and reusable.
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > REST/RPC
